title: *1 MONTH FREE!* (Affordable) Luxury in South ATX
posting_body: Check out this South Austin community having the luxury feel without the luxury price $$$
Being only a few minutes away from SouthPark Meadows shopping center you are just a stones throw away from all the shops and restaurants you need.
Or you can jump on I35 and be downtown in less than 10 minutes!
Stroll through the neighborhood and discover exceptional outdoor and indoor amenities, including the infinity-edge pool, the on-site dog park and the twenty-four-hour fitness center.
Call/text me today to find out more!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
